full_name: Stephen Slauenwhite, CPA, CMA, MBA, CEPA
occupation: Regional Director Atlantic Canada at The CFO Centre Canada
headline: CFO - Strategic Business Advisor - Experienced Executive
summary:
The CFO Centre Limited provides the skills and experience of large company CFOs to small & medium sized enterprises on a part-time basis. Increasingly, the part-time Chief Financial Officer is being used by owners of small and medium sized businesses to provide the solution to their financial issues. A part time CFO with big company experience can provide analysis, advice and positive intervention when itâ€™s required,
at a fraction of the cost of an in-house CFO.

As an experienced CFO and business leader who provides the strategic and operational guidance that enables companies to profitably grow their business, I realized there was a great need and an opportunity in providing these skills to the SME market.

The CFO Centre Limited is a subsidiary of The FD Centre Limited, the UK market leader in providing part-time CFOs (FDs) to the SME market in the UK, Australia and South Africa.

Specialties: My specific accomplishments in both large public & private companies includes extensive commercial banking experience on all aspects of commercial banking including financing & restructuring, establishing USA/Canada cross boarder structures, acquisitions, change management, succession planning, ERP implementation (SAP) with establishing project management office, senior human resource management including strategic policy development , and employee retention, pension administration including restructuring DB and DC pension plans and corporate strategic initiatives.

As the Regional Director for Atlantic Canada, I oversee both the recruitment of part-time CFOs to cover the Atlantic region and work closely with business owners and professionals to develop relationships with small and medium sized companies and match the needs of business owners to the services of the CFO Centre.

Strategic role responsible for the overall management of the company, with responsibility for planning, implementing, managing, and controlling all financially-related activities of the company. Direct responsibility for finance, accounting, audit, tax, insurance, budget, forecasting, credit and treasury, information systems, legal, human resources, pension and benefit, government affairs and strategy of this growth oriented company. 

Emmerson Packaging (a division of EPC Industries Limited) is a leading flexible packaging company serving some of the best-known brands in North America for 60 years. Emmerson Packaging has grown to be one of Atlantic Canada's most successful manufacturing organizations and is recognized as one of Canada's 50 Best Managed Companies.
